subtitle: This store cupboard recipe makes a satisfying and very healthy lunch

method.text: Transfer the drained sardines onto a plate. Pour over a little hot water to rinse off excess oil and drain again.
Melt the butter in a shallow dish for 15-30 seconds in the microwave on 100% FULL power. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Add the sardines to the dish and turn them over in the mixture.
Cover and cook for 2 - 2 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> min on 100% FULL power.
Serve on rounds of hot buttered toast.

title: Devilled sardines on toast
